Experience

Summer Research Intern

CSIR-CEERI (Central Electronics and Engineering Research Institute), Chennai
Project Title: Analysis of physiological signals for state(normal/fatigue) monitoring
  • 40% of the highway accidents in India occur due to drivers dosing off according to CRRI study. Our work aimed to address this problem by alarming the driver in advance.
  • Worked with PPG signals to extract a set of features that were passed to various Machine Learning Classification Algorithms to predict whether the subject was fatigue or normal.
  • Achieved an overall accuracy of 95.26% using Support Vector Machine Algorithm.
May 2021 - August 2021
